subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: To enter the 2013 Dubai World Cup races running on Saturday, a dozen South African horses had to spend a total of five months in quarantine in a variety of climates in four countries and two hemispheres.
snippet: To enter the 2013 Dubai World Cup races running on Saturday, a dozen South African horses had to spend a total of five months in quarantine in a variety of climates in four countries and two hemispheres.
